column5: I recently bought a 1930 Ontario Topographical Map of the Rainy Lake-Lake of the Woods-Lake Seul area. On it is stamped in bluish/purplish ink "Lloyd's Tourist Emporium Canoes, Blankets, Tents, Indian Guides, Provisions Fort Frances, Ontario." Does anyone have any information about Lloyd's Emporium? When it was open, when it closed, etc.?
I think this talks about what you're looking for:http://www.rainylakeconservancy.org/...pring_2005.pdf
